description:
There are some things you could just watch forever, and one of them is a campfire. This campfire doesn’t get your clothes smoky or leave a char mark on the ground.

  • Steel body has a protective enamel finish
  • Stainless steel burner has output of 58,000 BTU/hr
  • Valve knob lets you adjust the flame height
  • Included natural lava rock set gives flickering effect similar to a wood fire
  • CSA approved is safe to use during most campfire bans (check local restrictions)
  • Includes Cover + Carry Kit, 10ft. hose with regulator, lava rock and propane tank stabilizer ring
name: Outland Living Firecube Fire Pit
